TopicTitle: [WIP] [Kopernicus] KerbalGalaxy 2 | KerbalGalaxy now works on Kopernicus!

Articles.Content:

Sun now a black hole.

Created new Kerbol.

Added several new stars

Added new planets orbiting this stars

To do:
